author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-2982 Prepend  / to path url patterns in servlet mappings if missing.  Also some much bigger changes to improve info in exception messages and some genericization

author: erodriguez
msg: o  Removal of parameters for configuring LDAP and LDAPS.  These are now in LdapConfiguration.
o  Removal of boolean parameters for enabling individual protocol providers.  These are now in the ServiceConfiguration base class used by all the protocol providers.
o  Addition of configuration beans for all the protocol providers:  LDAP, LDAPS, Kerberos, NTP, and Change Password.  DNS is available but was not originally part of the server so was left out.

author: erodriguez
msg: Removal of max time limit and max size limit parameters from core StartupConfiguration.  These are now parameters of the new LdapConfiguration bean.

author: erodriguez
msg: Added new integration test to test SASL GSSAPI binds.
